Translations.Text: aur shapath hai raatri kee, jab usaka sannaata chha jaaye
(he nabee!) tere paalanahaar ne tujhe na to chhoda aur ne hee vimukh hua
aur nishchay hee aagaamee yug tere lie pratham yug se uttam hai
aur tera paalanahaar tujhe itana dega ki too prasann ho jaayega
kya usane tujhe anaath paakar sharan nahin dee
aur tujhe path bhoola hua paaya, to seedha maarg nahin dikhaaya
aur nirdhan paaya, to dhanee nahin kar diya
to tum anaath par krodh na karana
aur maangane vaale ko na jhidakana
aur apane paalanahaar ke upakaar ka varnan karana
